description: This list contains information on changes in status to current medallion drivers and their corresponding record history starting from 10/28/2013 (inclusive). Historical information from 03/07/2013 – 01/04/2014 can be found at https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Transportation/Medallion-Drivers-Active/n776-dsqy. The most recently published active medallion drivers list can be found at https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Transportation/Medallion-Drivers-Active/jb3k-j3gp

name: Medallion Drivers – Status Change Log 10/28/2013 - present
